document_data.name: Ensril Surlpar
document_data.mainbody: '''Ensril Surlpar''' was one of the younger adults and heirs in the [[Surlpar]] family—a wealthy and powerful clan that held one of the twenty [[Onsruur]] (lords' council) seats in the city of [[Khôltar]], [[south Faerûn]], ''circa'' the [[1372 DR|Year of Wild Magic, 1372 DR]].{{Cite web/Elminster Speaks archive|78}}{{Cite web/Elminster Speaks/Part 60: Khôltar, Part 11, A Last Look Around Handrornlar}}
document_data.Description: Ensril had the shock of blond-to-white hair that was a characteristic of the Surlpars.{{Cite web/Elminster Speaks archive|88}}{{Cite web/Elminster Speaks/Part 66: Khôltar, Part 17, More on the Onsruur}}
document_data.Personality: He was one of the Iron City elite and had developed an expensive taste in clothing. He relished fine wines and beautiful women.
document_data.Possessions: Ensril Surlpar was the owner of a filthy, old blurdren (food counter) called [[Surlpar's Stews]] that had a prime location. He cared nothing for the business except that it turned a nice profit by keeping prices low and quality at a bare minimum.
